main event: On May 1, 1952, pilots observed two unidentified flying objects while flying a B-36 over Davis-Monthan AFB in Arizona.
interesting points: The UFOs were shiny metal in color and circular in shape., The objects overtook the B-36 at three times its speed., The UFOs hovered near the B-36 before disappearing at high speed., The B-36 crew reported no interference in flying characteristics or equipment., Approximately six to seven other Air Force personnel also reported seeing the UFOs from the ground.
witness description: B-36 crew and additional Air Force personnel
